scripts.sample-request: curl -X POST -H 'Authorization: Bearer secret' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"personalizations": [{"to": [{"email": "example@example.com"}]}],"from": {"email": "example@example.com"},"subject": "Hello, World!","content": [{"type": "text/plain", "value": "Heya!"}]}' http://localhost:3030/v3/mail/send
